addNuevaVersion.title: Nueva versión de Mi Movilidad
addNuevaVersion.text: Hay una nueva versión disponible. ¿Desea actualizar la aplicación?

info.title: Cierre de sesión
info.text: Tu sesión ha caducado por razones de seguridad. Por favor, vuelve a iniciar sesión para continuar utilizando nuestros servicios.

error.text: Error inesperado del sistema, Tu sesión ha caducado por razones de seguridad. Por favor, vuelve a iniciar sesión más tarde.
El usuario no esta registrado en el sistema

v1.title: Log out
v1.text: Are you sure you want to log out?

v1.title: No internet connection
v1.text: You are currently in offline mode. You do not have an internet connection and some options may be limited. Please reset your connection to access all features.

v2.title: Offline mode
v2.text: To access this option, an internet connection is required. Please check your connection and try again.

v3.title: No internet connection
v3.text: You are currently in offline mode. Since you have lost the internet connection, the session will be closed since some options are limited. Please, reset your connection to continue browsing authenticated.

login.cuerpo-texto: Register or access your account to manage appointments, subpoenas, immobilizations and mobility procedures.

recupera-contrasena.descripcion: Enter the following information and we will send you an email so you can recover your password

registro.formato-fecha: The format must be yyyy-mm-dd and the latest date is today
registro.mensaje: Remember that with this email your account will be created
registro.tratamientoDatos: I accept the Personal Data Treatment Policy

home.titulo-card-header: Here you will find updated information on the procedures and services offered. Enter each option for more details.
home.explora: Explore other services available to you.
home.descubre: Discover the locations of the different services in Bogotá
home.activarFirmaElectronica: Activate your electronic signature in just a few minutes.
home.cardText: From here you can start or continue with any process and/or service you have with the District Mobility Secretary.

reporte.cardText: Access up-to-date and detailed information. Use the buttonFilter to customize the search criteria and display the data according to your needs.
reporte.textCard: Accede a información actualizada y detallada. Utiliza el botón de Filtrar para personalizar los criterios de búsqueda y visualizar los datos según tus necesidades.

firma-electronica.privacidad1: a. XYZ Page is committed to protecting the privacy of personal data provided during the registration process.
firma-electronica.privacidad2: b. The data collected during registration will be used only for the purposes related to the services offered by XYZ.
firma-electronica.privacidad3: c. We will not share, sell or otherwise disclose users' personal data to third parties without their explicit consent, unless required by law.
firma-electronica.veracidad1: a. Users must provide true, complete and up-to-date information during registration on the XYZ page.
firma-electronica.veracidad2: b. Any false, misleading or incomplete information may result in the suspension or termination of the user's account.
firma-electronica.responsabilidad1: a. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login information and for protecting their account from unauthorized access.
firma-electronica.responsabilidad2: b. Any activity carried out through the user's account will be considered the sole responsibility of the account holder.
firma-electronica.uso1: a. Users agree to use the XYZ page in an appropriate and respectful manner, without engaging in illegal, fraudulent, defamatory, obscene or harmful activities.
firma-electronica.uso2: b. The use of the page to send spam, junk mail or other types of unsolicited communications is prohibited.
firma-electronica.suspension1: a. XYZ reserves the right to suspend or terminate the account of any user who violates these registration policies or the site's terms of service.
firma-electronica.suspension2: b. In case of suspicion of fraudulent activity, XYZ may take the necessary measures, including cooperation with the competent authorities.
firma-electronica.consentimiento1: a. By registering on the XYZ page, the user consents to the processing of their personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
firma-electronica.consentimiento2: b. The user has the right to withdraw their consent at any time, which will result in the deletion of their personal data from our database.
firma-electronica.recopilacion1: a. XYZ Page will collect personal information such as name, email address and date of birth during the registration process. This data is necessary to provide personalized services and improve the user experience.
firma-electronica.recopilacion2: b. In addition to the data provided during registration, we may collect additional information automatically, such as IP address, browser type and device used, for statistical and security purposes.
firma-electronica.cookies1: a. The XYZ page uses cookies to improve the user experience and provide personalized functionalities. By using the page, the user accepts the use of cookies in accordance with our cookie policy.
firma-electronica.seguridad1: a. The XYZ page implements appropriate security measures to protect users' personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure or alteration.
firma-electronica.seguridad2: b. However, it is important to note that no data transmission over the Internet is completely secure. Although we strive to protect user information, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of data transmitted through our site.
firma-electronica.comunicaciones1: a. With the user's consent, XYZ Page may send marketing communications, such as newsletters or promotions, to the email address provided during registration.
firma-electronica.comunicaciones2: b. The user has the right to opt out of receiving such communications at any time, using the unsubscribe link included in each email or modifying their preferences in their account.
firma-electronica.retencion1: a. XYZ Page will retain users' personal data for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless otherwise requested or required by law.
firma-electronica.retencion2: b. At the end of the relationship with the page, personal data will be securely deleted, unless it must be kept to comply with legal obligations or resolve disputes.
firma-electronica.transferencia1: a. In the event of a transfer of data to third parties, XYZ Page will ensure that applicable legal data protection requirements are met and that appropriate confidentiality agreements are established.
firma-electronica.acceso1: a. Users have the right to access, correct or update their personal data stored on our page. To exercise this right, you can contact our support team or use the options available in your account.
firma-electronica.menores1: a. The XYZ Page is designed for use by persons 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If a minor is identified as having provided information without parental or guardian consent, we will take steps to delete such information.
firma-electronica.modificaciones1: a. XYZ reserves the right to modify these registration policies at any time. Any change will be notified to users through the page or by email. Users are encouraged to regularly review these policies to be informed of updates.

mi-perfil.formato: The format must be yyyy-mm-dd and the latest date is today

taxis.subText: Check if a taxi is legally registered in Bogotá and has the necessary documents or permits to provide public transport services.

anonimo.textCard: <span>Descarga estas aplicaciones móviles esenciales para mejorar tu movilidad en la ciudad.</spam>
anonimo.title: Mi Movilidad at a click
anonimo.textCard2: <spam>Explore mobility services, procedures and consultations in Bogotá quickly and easily.</spam>
anonimo.apptext: Discover the best mobile applications to optimize your mobility in the city.
anonimo.masServiciosText: Log in or register to access more services and update your information.

asesorias.cardText: From here you will be able to know and access other services of the District Department of Mobility.
asesorias.subTextservicioTaxi: Get to know and enjoy the legal taxi service in Bogotá.
asesorias.orientacionVictimas: Guidance for Victims of Road Accidents
asesorias.asesoriasyconsultasText: If you are the victim of a road accident in the Capital District and/or have an affected family member, access free legal, social and psychological counseling services offered by the District Mobility Secretariat.
asesorias.picoyplacaText: Verify the authorization of a vehicle to circulate without restrictions by peak and license plate.

centroAyuda.subText1: <spam>Contact Lucía, the virtual advisor for citizen services of the District Mobility Secretariat, who is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. </spam>
centroAyuda.orientacionVictimas: Guidance for Victims of Road Accidents
centroAyuda.subText2: If you are the victim of a road accident in the Capital District and/or have an affected family member, access free legal, social and psychological counseling services offered by the District Mobility Secretariat.
centroAyuda.text: If you have problems with our platform or with the management you are carrying out, send us an email to
centroAyuda.horario: Monday to Friday: 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. - Saturdays: 8:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

tramites.cardTramite: Know the requirements and start a new face-to-face or virtual procedure of the Single Window for Services, You can also consult and manage your current requests.

cardText.mensajeUno: Conoce los requisitos e inicia un nuevo trámite presencial o virtual de la Ventanilla Única de Servicios, también puedes consultar y gestionar tus solicitudes vigentes.
cardText.mensajeDos: Para realizar una nueva solicitud, selecciona la categoría del trámite que deseas.
